pages.title: Zweiender
pages.text: $(li)The Zweiender is the result of the combination of the $(br)$(l:patchouli:weapons/end_crystal_sword)End Crystal Sword$(/l), an $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/cataclysm/enderite_ingot)Enderite Ingot$(/l) and an $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/eye_of_ender)Eye of Ender$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will deal double damage to any creature you hit with it on its back.

pages.name: Zweiender
pages.text: This weapon doesn't have durability and can't be burned by lava or fire.
